title.rendered: FIS employees paint walls of Mission Education centre

content.rendered:
Children love to draw on the walls of their house and express their creativity in this manner. Children at Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centers are encouraged to paint their imaginations onto their classroom walls! During a visit to the Mumbai and Gurgaon centres, employees from FIS not just supported the kids to discover their hidden talent, but relived their own childhood days too! Clasroom walls were painted to make the space much more colorful and bright. The children and the employees had a gala time during the activity.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.
